name: Pearl Izumi Bioviz Barrier Jacket - Men's
description:
For better presence on the road. This light shell blocks the wind and repels light rain. But that's not all. Highly reflective Bioviz® details make you extra visible on the road, even in low light conditions. And with 360 degress of reflective prints, other road users can easily spot you from any angle.BioViz® reflective print maximizes visibility to improve your safety.Recycled polyester fabric with a DWR finish cuts wind and sheds light precipitation.2-way zipper closes smoothly and lets you vent from the top or bottom.Silicone gripped hem keeps the jacket in place at the back.Rear pocket.Hem is adjustable from both sides.

        Sustainability
